instruction: Create a text summary of 200 words from this article.
input: Apple announced a major event today during which they are expected to unveil a range of new products. The event is said to include mac computers, iPads, and Apple Watches. In addition to the hardware announcements, the company is rumored to be introducing a new service that blends artificial intelligence and machine learning. This service is designed to make it easier to use their products.
output: Apple held a major event today and announced a range of new products including Mac computers, iPads, and Apple Watches. Along with hardware updates, the company also introduced a new service which blends artificial intelligence and machine learning to create an easier user-experience. This service makes it easier for users to locate, interact, and use all the products through personalized, intuitive commands. Further, the machine-learning technology will learn from the users' habits and immediately fulfill requests. The new technology is expected to be a great addition to the Apple eco-system.
